Articles.Content: I think everyone is waking up. I feel the g's from the rapid increase in speed.

> 
> Are you going to send Jeb up first or Valentina?

Why not both? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Val's been waiting a long time.

Well yeah, Val first obviously. Jeb's been to Jool and back like a million times already, and another million times with no return trip.

> 
> ~It's the final count down!~

\*plays sick guitar solo with the thrust of 3.75 meter main stages.\*
I'm gonna send Val into space riding a rocket bada\*\* rodeo style.

> 
> \*plays sick guitar solo with the thrust of 3.75 meter main stages.\*

\*solo ends\*

~We're leaving together!~

> 
> \*plays sick guitar solo with the thrust of 3.75 meter main stages.\*

No no no, we need 5m main stages!

Okay, yes I know stock KSP won't have those, at least not in 1.0 anyway.

> 
> \*snip\*
> The script will show me a desktop notification if KSP is released

That is brilliant! Have some rep!
i feel we can tell when people are sipping there coffee, the posts slow down ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I just reloaded the page like 20 times a second ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Youtube let me down. It switched to Here I go again by whitesnake... Considering seeing how long I can last just listening to the final countdown on repeat.
I feel compelled to hype more just to completely obliterate the nay-sayers thread in page count.
I am pretty darn sure I had a KSP dream. If only I could remember what it was about... Oh well, HYPE!

> 
> I just reloaded the page like 20 times a second ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Same here.

RELEASE THE KRAKEN!

Also hello.
And Server Migration Page back to text...

> 
> I am pretty darn sure I had a KSP dream. If only I could remember what it was about... Oh well, HYPE!

Last night? 

I dreamed that I dropped my wife's new smartphone and cracked the screen. \*sigh\*
To those saying that the mobile page is different, well, I checked it out on my iphone and the page is the same, just unformatted for some reason.
We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!
Ill go catch a few hours of afternoon sleep, to be ready for a long night ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This hype is surreal.
I've just come back to home, now the hype is killing me. Shiet

> 
> To those saying that the mobile page is different, well, I checked it out on my iphone and the page is the same, just unformatted for some reason.

I said it was different a while ago because it was at the time. I opened my phone and browser at the same time, did a google search on both at the same time and clicked on the main page at the same time.

They just like 2 minutes ago switched the browser version back to text.

> 
> We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!

Wish granted. Release is delayed by 2 months

> 
> We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!

Who has time for grandchildren when you have Kerbals instead?

You can't explode grandchildren.
